name: The Backwoods (AustinThomas)
description:
Welcome to the Backwoods.

You are trapped in a dark forest, equipped with only a map and a flashlight. In order to escape, you must activate 5 generators placed around the map. Try to be fast, though, because you're not alone - an angry ghoul stalks you through the trees.

Thank you for trying my game! This is my first ever FPS survival horror made in Unity and I appreciate any interest.

Feedback is welcome!
  • Let me know down in the comments what you think should be added or removed.
  • Make me aware of any bugs or issues with the game.
  • Feel free to use the game for any Let's Plays or streams, but shoot me a link if you're able :)

Contact Me: austinthomasvfx@gmail.com
